title: If damage to objectives(turrets) counted as champion damage....
body:
Would more people in Bronze/low elo (me) play more responsibly by actually trying to win instead of dicking around and try to get LC$BIGPLAYS LOLWTF kills?

What if turret kills became part of the KDA(T)?

If Riot really wants to help bad players get better, just incorporate the things they SHOULD be doing into what they WANT to do. ie, big champ damage/big KDA

Am I crazy or would that legitimately help low elo players...?
